title: Why are so many Taehyung stans so upset with the Make It Right Remix featuring Lauv? - Quora

response.answer_text: They’re upset because his solo lines in ‘Make It Right’ got cut out to make room for Lauv’s feature. Honestly, I think it’s a dumb thing to be upset about. Jungkook had the same thing happen but for both of them, you can hear them in the chorus and doing the harmonies. The collab is probably never going to be sung live, and if it was, BigHit will, of course, make sure both of them get to sing. It’s also not being promoted or released around the same time as their actual comeback. This was just a chance for BTS to have some fun with another artist they admire. BTS has a huge influence on their own music and collabs; if Taehyung really found it such a problem then I’m sure they would’ve changed it. I’m actually a bit pissed off at this whole discussion and how ARMY is blowing it out of proportion. Also because all these fans that are so pressed about Taehyung not having any lines don’t give a crap that Jungkook doesn’t have any solo lines either. Like, fine, be annoyed about it but then be annoyed for all of them, not just your faves! Let’s just support the song :) —Sani
